thread.title: Kelly Ripa's Daughter Braless With 'Open Legs' Is 'Inappropriate'
thread.title_full: Kelly Ripa's Daughter Braless With 'Open Legs' Is 'Inappropriate'

author: Evie Scott
title: Kelly Ripa's Daughter Braless With 'Open Legs' Is 'Inappropriate'
text:
Kelly Ripa's Daughter Braless With 'Open Legs' Is 'Inappropriate'
By Evie Scott on September 25, 2025 at 4:00 AM EDT
Kelly Ripa's daughter, Lola Consuelos, is facing backlash from her own Instagram followers as she drops a major announcement. The 24-year-old, who made her music debut in 2022, is gearing up to release her Sorry, it's all about me album, and it looks like her cover has caused controversy. Posting a photo of herself in a skimpy cami top and undies as she sat on the floor this week, Lola showed off her curves while announcing her "Lola" track, but the feedback was very mixed. Over 20 fans agreed when a user called Lola out on the photo, speaking of her legs being "open" and calling the whole thing "inappropriate."
Kelly Ripa's Daughter Shows Off Racy Album Cover
View this post on Instagram
Scroll for the photo. Posing against a pink backdrop as she sat with her legs parted, Lola sent out girly vibes, gazing upward and ahead while highlighting her curvy silhouette.
Going barely there in tight underpants, the "Paranoia Silverlining" hitmaker flashed her braless assets in a low-cut cami in white, going strappy and with cute pink bows on her straps adding feminine accents.
See More Photos Below!
View this post on Instagram
Keeping her look cute, innocent, and sexy, Lola wore slightly sparkly stockings in pink and tan, ditching her shoes and wearing her hair down. The only daughter to TV hosts Kelly Ripa and Mark Consuelos told fans: "The first single ‘Lola’ of my DEBUT EP ‘Sorry, it’s all about me’ will be yours October 17th. Pre-save link in my bio now!! ! I cannot wait for you all to hear this project - it’s so special to me."
"Inappropriate clothing if it is clothing," the critical user replied. Joining in the negativity, another replied: "Completely agree- she is a beautiful girl but the pose is just awful- legs open and don’t even know what she is wearing…" A third asked "why such a beautiful girl feels like she has to expose her body in this way???"
Mom Kelly Tops Comments
View this post on Instagram
The post also attracted support from mom Kelly, who wrote: "PRE-SAVED!" She added a heart emoji, with fans leaving the reply 70 likes.
Kelly Ripa's daughter made a bang three years ago, releasing her debut "Paranoia Silverlining" track and quickly landing herself a Billboardfeature to coincide with the release. “They hear me sing all the time,” Lola told the outlet as she mentioned how supportive her parents had been. “They were like, ‘Lola, you need to put something out there.’ So when I finally had something that I really liked, they were just super excited for me," she continued.
All Smiles In Swimsuit From Italy Pool
View this post on Instagram
Kelly Ripa's daughter joined her family for this Puglia vacation, which brought a stunning pool shot of her peeping her swimsuit body. Lola has since made headlines for leaving her nearest and dearest for a new life in London, U.K.
